aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-2600-928 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Trim tab actuator binding. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 29/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 01/04/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 02/04/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 04/04/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 05/04/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
